author: Tyler Colp
description: Moderators of the Helldivers subreddit have threatened to ban players for showing off the game-breaking technique.
title: Civil war breaks out in Helldivers 2 as players are spawning infinite mechs to crash each other's games

author: Morgan Park
description: "I'm not interested in appealing to the mass market, or selling millions of copies."
title: Hideo Kojima says most Death Stranding playtesters told him 'it was a terrible game,' and he's a little bummed Death Stranding 2 is testing way better

author: Tyler Colp
description: A photo mode is coming before the end of the year too.
title: Avowed lets you replace spiders with orbs in the first of its major updates coming this year

author: Lincoln Carpenter
description: It's less than a year since Bungie last admitted to using an artist's work without permission.
title: Artist accuses Bungie of stealing her designs for Marathon's art: 'I am tired of designers from huge companies moodboarding and parasitising my designs while I struggle to make a living'

author: Ted Litchfield
description: Fallout 3, 4, and Skyrim's AI systems all had fewer variables than Oblivion's.
title: After hearing the king of funny Elder Scrolls clips explain how Oblivion NPCs work, I have a newfound respect for elves who steal food when they're hungry and husbands who fight their wives' dogs

author: Christopher Livingston
description: Meanwhile, 107,000 players passed through Shai-Hulud's digestive system.
title: Dune: Awakening beta players extracted nearly 9 million liters of blood last weekend, enough to fill 3 Olympic-size, extremely gross swimming pools

description: She can't hear us, she's got ear armor on.
